content: अनुपतनं, पातः {@--1@} Falling upon, alighting upon in succession. {@--2@} Following, going after, pursuit; उपवनपवनानुपातदक्षैः <ls>Śi. 7. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Going or proceeding in order or as a consequence. {@--4@} [अनुरूपः त्रैराशिकेन पातः] Proportion. {@--5@} Rule of three. {@--6@} A degree of latitude, opposite to one given. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (regarded as a ṇamul from पत्) Following in succession, going after; लतानुपातं कुसुमान्यगृह्णात् <ls>Bk. 2. 11</ls> (लतां लतामनुपात्य going to creeper after creeper, or after bending the creepers).
